name: Game of bombs
description:
Blast the monsters in Game of Bombs!
A fun game for everyone to play, unlock dozens of levels spread though different worlds.
Drop your bombs to drop the monsters, simple as that

NO ADS
NO IN APP PURCHASES

100% full game with no disturbance what so ever,
grab yourself a real bargain today and play for many hours!

Game of Bombs is super easy to play and combines arcade gaming with strategy and puzzle in the same time so you will need to plan ahead, place the bomb in a good position and fire away and hope that your blast will do the trick.
